alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 6:56PM AKST until December 26 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...STORM WILL BRING HEAVY SNOW TO THE HIGHWAYS... .Up to 12 inches of snow was reported along the Klondike Highway this morning while the Haines Highway was mostly rain. Temperatures are hovering around freezing near milepost 16 on the Haines Highway allowing for additional snow accumulation overnight. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Haines Highway near Haines Customs. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold air past milepost 16 will allow for additional accumulation overnight through the border.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
